links.*: Beowulf: The Monsters and the Critics
Letter to George Allen and Unwin
Symphony No. 1, "The Lord of the Rings"
Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series)
The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)
The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[3 January|3]]''' - Actor [[Norman Forsey]] is born.
* '''[[4 January|4]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 9]].
* '''[[7 January|7]]''' - At the request of his father, young [[Rayner Unwin]] writes a book report on ''[[Farmer Giles of Ham]]''. This is the first of many positive critiques.
* '''[[16 January|16]]''' - Artist [[Klaus Ensikat]] is born.
* '''[[17 January|17]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 10]].

==February==
* '''[[4 February|4]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s poem "[[The Dragon's Visit]]" is published in ''The Oxford Magazine''.
* '''[[5 February|5]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 11]].
* '''[[12 February|12]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 11a]].
* '''[[18 February|18]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s poem "[[The Mewlips|Knocking at the Door]]" is published in ''The Oxford Magazine''.
==March==
* '''[[4 March|4]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s poem "[[Iúmonna Gold Galdre Bewunden]]" is republished in the ''Oxford Magazine''.
* '''[[6 March|6]]''' - [[Michael Deacon]], who would voice [[Gríma|Gríma Wormtongue]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1978 film)]], is born.
* '''[[10 March|10]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 11b]].
==April==
* '''?''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 11c]].
* '''[[13 April|13]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 12]].
* '''[[15 April|15]]''' - Charles Furth writes [[Letter to Charles Furth (25 April 1937)|a letter to J.R.R.Tolkien]].
* '''[[20 April|20]]''' - [[George Takei]], who travelled the world as narrator of [[Johan de Meij]]'s ''[[Symphony No. 1, "The Lord of the Rings"]]'', is born.
* '''[[25 April|25]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Charles Furth (25 April 1937)|a letter to Charles Furth]].
==May==
* '''[[13 May|13]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 13]].
* '''[[28 May|28]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 14]].
==June==
* '''[[10 June|10]]''' - ''[[The Battle of Maldon (E.V. Gordon)|The Battle of Maldon]]'', edited by [[E.V. Gordon]] and with contribution by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], is published.
* '''[[25 June|25]]''' - Author [[Timothy J. Wheeler]] is born.
==July==
* '''[[1 July|1]]''' - ''[[Beowulf: The Monsters and the Critics]]'' is published.
==August==
* '''[[1 August|1]]''' - [[Ian Hogg]], who would voice [[Tom Bombadil]] in [[BBC]]'s radio series of ''[[Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series)|Tales from the Perilous Realm]]'', is born.
* '''[[5 August|5]]''' - [[Alan Howard]], the voice for [[the One Ring]] in [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]] and [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King|The Return of the King]], is born.
* '''[[31 August|31]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 15]].
==September==
* '''[[7 September|7]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to George Allen and Unwin|a letter to George Allen & Unwin]] concerning the promotion of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and mentioning his friend [[Wilfred Rowland Childe]].
* '''[[17 September|17]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 15a]].
* '''[[21 September|21]]''' - '''''[[The Hobbit]]'' is published.'''
* '''[[21 September|21]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Simonne d'Ardenne (21 September 1937)|a letter to Simonne d'Ardenne]].
* '''[[21 September|21]]''' – [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] signs copies of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and sends them to [[E.V. Gordon]], [[Elaine Griffiths]], Helen Buckhurst, [[Stella Mills]], [[Hilary Tolkien]], [[C.S. Lewis]] and [[Katherine Kilbride]].
* '''[[22 September|22]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Jane Neave (22 September 1937)|a letter to Jane Neave]].
* '''[[28 September|28]]''' - [[Donald Gee]], who would voice [[Radagast]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|1981 radio series]], is born.

==October==
* '''[[2 October|2]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 15b]].
* '''[[2 October|2]]''' - [[C.S. Lewis]] publishes [[A World for Children|a review]] of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' in ''The Times Literary Supplement''.
* '''[[3 October|3]]''' -  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 16]].
* '''[[8 October|8]]''' - [[C.S. Lewis]] reviews ''[[The Hobbit]]'' in ''The Times''.
* '''[[9 October|9]]''' - [[Brian Blessed]], who would play [[Farmer Giles]] in [[Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series)|''Tales from the Perilous Realm'' (1992 radio series)]], is born.
* '''[[15 October|15]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 17]].
* '''[[23 October|23]]''' -  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 18]].
==November==
* '''[[15 November|15]]''' - Tolkien submits to [[Allen & Unwin]] a bundle of manuscripts including ''[[The Lay of Leithian]]'' ("Long Poem"); ''[[Quenta Silmarillion (Lost Road)|Quenta Silmarillion]]'', ''[[Ainulindalë (Lost Road)|Ainulindalë]]'', ''[[Ambarkanta]]'',  and ''[[The Fall of Númenor (chapter)]]'' ("The Gnomes Material"); [[The Lost Road]]; and ''[[Farmer Giles of Ham]]'' and ''[[Mr. Bliss]]''. They also discuss ''[[Beowulf and the Finnsburg Fragment|Beowulf]]''.
* '''[[22 November|22]]''' -  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 18a]].
* '''[[28 November|28]]''' - G.E. Selby writes [[Letter to G.E. Selby (14 December 1937)|a letter to J.R.R.Tolkien]]. 
* '''[[29 November|29]]''' - [[Jared Lobdell]] is born.

==December==
* '''[[13 December|13]]''' - [[Letter to Arthur Ransome|Arthur Ransome writes a letter]] to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* '''[[14 December|14]]-[[15 December|15]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to G.E. Selby (14 December 1937)|a letter to G.E. Selby]].
* '''[[15 December|15]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Arthur Ransome|a letter to Arthur Ransome]].
* '''15''' - [[Stanley Unwin]] writes to Tolkien that his "Silmarillion" is not fit for a book by itself, but rather "wonderful material" to inspire more books like ''The Hobbit''.<ref>{{LB|Note}}, p. 366</ref>
* '''[[16 December|16]]-[[19 December|19]]''' - Tolkien starts writing the first chapter of the "New Hobbit", which will later become ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.
* '''[[16 December|16]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 19]].
* '''[[17 December|17]]''' - Charles Furth writes [[Letter to Charles Furth (19 December 1937)|a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* '''[[19 December|19]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 20|a letter to Charles Furth (Letter 20)]].
* '''[[25 December|25]]''' - [[Father Christmas]] writes a letter to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s children.

==?==
* '''?''' - Tolkien submits ''[[The Father Christmas Letters]]'' and a draft of ''[[The Silmarillion]]'' for publication but they are rejected.
* '''?''' - Author [[Jared Lobdell]] is born. 
{{references}}
